text: Llanfairpwll railway station is a station on the North Wales Coast Line from Crewe to , serving the village of Llanfairpwllgwyngyll, Anglesey. The station is known for its longer name, Llanfairpwllgwyngyllgogerychwyrndrobwllllantysiliogogogoch station, but this is not historically used. Category:Railway stations in Wales Category:Anglesey
title: Llanfairpwll railway station
